item.title: 印度央行政策会议聚焦利率敏感型股票
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 资生堂因中国需求疲软而出现自 1987 年以来最大幅度下跌
item.description: 资生堂株式会社（Shiseido Co.由于中国需求疲软和美国的生产问题，资生堂株式会社公布了上半年亏损报告，该公司股价周四创下近 37 年来的最大跌幅，导致停牌。【原文：Shiseido Co. Ltd’s stock fell the most in almost 37 years on Thursday, leading to a trading halt, after reporting a first half loss due to weak demand from China and production issues in the US.】

item.title: 万达即将达成向首次公开募股前投资者支付贷款的协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大连万达商业管理集团股份有限公司（Dalian Wanda Commercial Management Group Co.【原文：Dalian Wanda Commercial Management Group Co. told some investors this week that a loan that could be used to pay some pre-IPO investors in one of its units is close to being finalized, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国国有银行在反牛市中加大债券抛售力度
item.description: 交易员称，中国大型国有银行周四上午大举抛售七年期国债，这表明中国政府打击创纪录债务反弹的行动正在升级。【原文：China’s big state banks sold seven-year government bonds in large sizes Thursday morning, traders said, in a sign the authorities’ fight against a record debt rally is escalating.】

item.title: 卢比自 5 月以来首次升破 1 美元兑 16,000 卢比
item.description: 随着美元走软以及官员们早些时候为平息投资者对新政府财政政策的担忧而采取的举措，印尼盾走强，突破了1美元兑16000印尼盾的关键门槛。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah strengthened past the key threshold of 16,000 per dollar following a weakening in the greenback and officials’ earlier moves to sooth investor angst over the incoming government’s fiscal policies.】

item.title: 摩根大通称四分之三的全球套利交易现已平仓
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Three-quarters of the global carry trade has now been removed, with a recent selloff erasing this year’s gains, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 解散的泰国政党成员誓言与旧卫队争夺权力
item.description: 泰国一个已解散的反对党的不屈不挠的支持者们承诺组建一个新组织，挑战保守势力对权力的控制，这为东南亚第二大经济体出现更多政治动荡埋下了伏笔。【原文：Defiant supporters of a disbanded Thai opposition party pledged to form a new outfit to challenge the conservative establishment’s grip on power, setting the stage for more political turmoil in Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 对冲基金放弃部分日元看涨押注，但对波动的担忧依然高涨
item.description: 对冲基金似乎已从最看涨日元的押注中回撤，但仍在当前水平支付高价对冲头寸，这表明货币下一步走势的不确定性增加。【原文：Hedge funds look to have pulled back from their most bullish yen bets but are still paying high prices to hedge positions at current levels, a sign of increased uncertainty as to where the currency will go next.】

item.title: 中国航空燃油需求激增成为炼油商难得的亮点
item.description: 随着航班重返蓝天，中国的航空燃油需求正在回升，这为国内炼油企业提供了一些支持，因为柴油和汽油消费低迷给炼油行业带来了压力。【原文：Jet fuel demand in China is on the mend as flights return to the skies, offering some support to domestic refiners grappling with muted diesel and gasoline consumption that’s weighed on the industry.】

item.title: 由于债券赎回迫在眉睫，乐天可能报告亏损收窄
item.description: 乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc. 看来将于周五公布 4-6 月份季度亏损收窄的报告，这将增强人们对其支付明年到期债券能力的信心。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. looks set to report on Friday a narrower loss in the April-June quarter, which would shore up confidence in its ability to pay bonds due through next year.】

item.title: 化肥巨头 Nutrien 在行业低迷之际任命新首席财务官
item.description: 在行业不景气侵蚀化肥巨头利润之际，Nutrien Ltd. 任命了新的首席财务官。【原文：Nutrien Ltd. named a new chief financial officer amid an industry downturn that has eroded the fertilizer giant’s profits.】

item.title: 中国钢铁业的困境仍未得到缓解
item.description: 全球最大的钢铁市场正在酝酿更多的麻烦。【原文：There’s more trouble brewing in the world’s biggest steel market.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好阿达尼寻求融资。星展银行任命首位女性首席执行官华纳减持电视频道戴蒙对通胀目标持怀疑态度以下是您需要了解的信息。【原文：Good morning. Adani seeks to raise funds. DBS names first female CEO. Warner writes down TV channels. Dimon skeptical on inflation target. Here's what you need to know. — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: ION Analytics 在市场波动中搁置 5 亿美元贷款交易
item.description: Andrea Pignataro 的 ION Group 旗下公司 ION Analytics 自 7 月下旬以来一直在向投资者推销一项 5 亿美元的杠杆贷款交易，但该交易已被终止，这表明信贷市场的不安情绪仍在持续。【原文：ION Analytics, a unit of Andrea Pignataro’s ION Group, has pulled the plug on a $500 million leveraged loan deal it had been marketing to investors since late July, in a sign of persisting jitters in credit markets.】

item.title: 交易商等待伊朗报复，石油延续复苏涨势
item.description: 伊朗可能对以色列实施报复性打击，作为对真主党和哈马斯领导人被暗杀的报复，交易商对此仍心有余悸，石油市场延续了一周来的最大涨幅。【原文：Oil extended its biggest advance in a week as traders remain on edge over a possible retaliatory strike by Iran on Israel as payback for assassinations of Hezbollah and Hamas leaders.】

item.title: 中国大型银行急于发债填补 2240 亿美元缺口
item.description: 中国最大的贷款机构正在疯狂发债，以锁定低利率，并在年底前弥补 2,240 亿美元的亏损吸收能力缺口。【原文：China’s biggest lenders are on a debt issuance spree as they lock in cheap rates and plug a $224 billion loss absorbency shortfall before the end of the year.】

item.title: 美股走低，日经指数期货指向日本股市低开
item.description: 在美国股市迅速回落之后，日本市场似乎又将迎来艰难的一天，股票期货显示东京股市将低开。【原文：Japanese markets look set for another rocky day, with stock futures pointing to a lower open in Tokyo after a rapid retreat in US shares.】

item.title: 新西兰人涌入澳大利亚
item.description: 早上好，我是 Georgie，我在悉尼为您播报今早的头条新闻。今日必读：- 澳大利亚金矿狂热追捧 M&A - 新西兰人为获得更高薪涌入澳大利亚 - 据称必和必拓将为巴西的金矿和铜矿寻找买家【原文：Good morning, it’s Georgie here in Sydney with this morning’s top news for you. Today’s must-reads:• Australian gold bugs see M&A splurge• Kiwis flock to Australia for better pay • BHP is said to seek buyer for gold, copper mines in Brazil】

item.title: 西方石油公司提高产量，增加皇冠岩收购支出
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp）在本月早些时候以 108 亿美元完成对 CrownRock LP 的收购后，提高了今年的生产和资本支出计划。【原文：Occidental Petroleum Corp. raised its production and capital spending plans for this year after closing its $10.8 billion acquisition of CrownRock LP earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国出售债券打击市场情绪，亚洲股市将下挫：市场综述
item.description: 在疲软的国债拍卖给华尔街的情绪带来新的打击之后，亚洲股市周四将下跌。【原文：Asian equities were set to drop Thursday after a weak Treasury auction dealt a fresh blow to sentiment on Wall Street.】

item.title: 宏利亚洲保险业增长强劲，利润增长 6
item.description: 宏利金融公司的亚洲业务进一步增长，在日本和香港的保险销售强劲，抵消了美国部门的疲软表现。【原文：Manulife Financial Corp.’s Asia business posted further gains, with strong insurance sales in Japan and Hong Kong, offsetting weaker performance in its US division.】

item.title: 阿克曼的潘兴广场公司考虑将霍华德-休斯公司私有化
item.description: 据一份监管文件显示，Pershing Square Capital Management LP 正在考虑将房地产公司 Howard Hughes Holdings Inc.【原文：Pershing Square Capital Management LP is considering a deal to take real estate company Howard Hughes Holdings Inc. private, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 随着 ARKK 创下 2024 年低点，凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）开始疯狂买入科技股
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）在她的旗舰基金跌至 2024 年新低之际，大举买入陷入市场崩溃的科技公司股票。【原文：Cathie Wood scooped up shares of tech firms caught in crushing market rout, just as her flagship fund sank to a new 2024 low.】

item.title: 警惕市场风险
item.description: 很高兴看到股市今早站稳了脚跟。但随着事态的进一步发展，事实上，我们看到的是一针强心剂。这是对美国股市的一个警告，因为它在很大程度上仍被定位于完美和软着陆。【原文：It was nice to see equity markets on firmer footing this morning. But as things have since unraveled a bit, in truth, we’re witnessing a shot across the bow. It’s a warning for a US equity market that’s still largely priced for perfection and positioned for a soft landing.】

item.title: 一切都错了 "之后，快钱研究员备受打击
item.description: 追逐华尔街最热门交易的量化基金正遭受重创，因为对势头的押注一下子适得其反。【原文：Quant funds that chase the hottest trades on Wall Street are getting thrashed as momentum bets backfire all at once.】

item.title: 阿根廷讨论通过桑坦德银行融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿根廷政府正在与桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）商谈可能提供 10 亿美元贷款的事宜，这是哈维尔-米莱伊总统在 1 月份偿还债务之前确保现金的举措之一。【原文：Argentina’s government is in talks with Banco Santander SA for a potential $1 billion loan, part of President Javier Milei’s move to secure cash ahead of a January debt payment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济观点摇摆不定，债券出现近一年来最大跌幅
item.description: 周三，在整个固定收益市场的投资者回调对优质债券的追捧后，市政债券下滑。【原文：Municipal bonds slid on Wednesday after investors across fixed income markets dialed back a flight to quality bid.】

item.title: 芝加哥因市场波动推迟 6.43 亿美元债券交易
item.description: 在 4 万亿美元的州和地方债券市场波动之际，芝加哥推迟了原定于周三定价的 6.43 亿美元债券销售。【原文：Chicago is delaying its $643 million bond sale that was expected to price on Wednesday amid volatility in the $4 trillion market for state and local bonds.】

item.title: 戴蒙说他对通胀率能否回到美联储 2% 的目标持怀疑态度
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，他对通胀率能否回到美联储2%的目标持怀疑态度，并列举了包括赤字支出和 "世界再军事化 "在内的风险。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said he’s skeptical that inflation will return to the Federal Reserve’s 2% target, citing risks including deficit spending and “remilitarization of the world.”】

item.title: 加拿大央行担心就业前景可能推迟消费反弹
item.description: 加拿大央行官员越来越担心，疲软的就业市场可能会推迟消费支出的复苏，这种担忧促使他们在上个月下调了利率。【原文：Bank of Canada officials are increasingly worried that a weaker jobs market may delay a recovery in consumer spending, a concern that encouraged them to cut interest rates last month.】
